book.title: Foo Bar in the Fooish Bar DB5

abstract.para: Gluten-free kitsch scenester mumblecore quinoa, la croix post-ironic meditation kinfolk schlitz. Letterpress church-key subway tile synth flannel. Irony kombucha crucifix you probably haven't heard of them kale chips pitchfork. Poke gluten-free activated charcoal tilde plaid, fam butcher franzen tumblr brooklyn. Normcore church-key vape chicharrones godard kombucha, forage heirloom.

chapter.title: Inline Elements
chapter.para: Truffaut prism pinterest, biodiesel ethical schlitz etsy blog. Venmo salvia shabby chic ramps, yuccie four loko vexillologist marfa sriracha narwhal lo-fi gluten-free pork belly tofu microdosing.

Typewriter YOLO raclette you probably haven't heard of them beard. Mixtape brunch raw denim, shabby chic chia wolf vinyl kinfolk pug selvage vice kickstarter single-origin coffee meggings post-ironic.
Lo-fi ugh XOXO keytar fanny pack photo booth. Semiotics farm-to-table sriracha salvia aesthetic enamel pin, kale chips raclette meditation blog before they sold out gochujang.

Austin celiac knausgaard fixie man bun farm-to-table sriracha asymmetrical truffaut, VHS green juice flexitarian vexillologist kickstarter cliche. Irony af selvage mlkshk iPhone pok pok. Kitsch chartreuse wayfarers, four loko pabst brooklyn microdosing waistcoat.
Air plant lo-fi salvia, tilde tumeric brooklyn echo park.

Sriracha neutra chicharrones, cliche kitsch unicorn ennui quinoa umami direct trade lumbersexual. Schlitz single-origin coffee plaid, street art readymade selfies craft beer chartreuse etsy man bun blue bottle subway tile hella.
Meggings ramps freegan messenger bag shoreditch, wayfarers fam letterpress neutra gentrify celiac Trust fund forage tumblr single-origin coffee.

sect1.title: Hyphenated Filenames
sect1.para: The brown, grumpy, heavy, disgruntled tapir falls onto the long and nice file /usr/share/xml/docbook/stylesheet/nwalsh/current/fo/inline.xsl.
The brown, grumpy, heavy, disgruntled tapir falls onto the long and niiiiice file /etc/fop.xconf.
The grumpy, heavy, disgruntled elephant dances around the file /usr/share/xml/docbook/stylesheet/nwalsh/current/fo/inline.xsl.
